welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pinellas Park! Known for its beautiful parks, friendly atmosphere, and vibrant community, we invite you to explore all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary concourse for domestic flights at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport, featuring a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the secondary concourse at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport, primarily used for international and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whitted Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport houses the majority of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit or data cap.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Mac Dill AFB Airport.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
